formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: The drag coefficient (Cd) is calculated using the formula: \( C_d = \frac{2F_d}{\rho v^2 A} \) where: Fd is the drag force in Newtons \(\rho\) is the fluid density in kg/m3 v is the velocity in m/s A is the frontal area in m2

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
